Actions.Name: Get Single Caveat
Actions.Description: Gets a caveat matching the supplied caveat code.

Actions.Name: Get Caveats
Actions.Description: Gets a list of caveats.

Actions.Name: Get Single Dataset
Actions.Description: Gets a single dataset matching the supplied dataset id.

Actions.Name: Get Dataset Items
Actions.Description: Gets a list of data items for a dataset,, optionally filtered, using logical disjunction (OR), by a list of reporting unit codes.

Actions.Name: Get Datasets
Actions.Description: Gets a list of datasets, optionally filtered by a list of measure and reported measure codes. Matching within each filter is by logical disjunction (OR) and matching across filters is by logical conjunction (AND).

Actions.Name: Get Flat Data
Actions.Description: Gets data in a flattened structure with each item corresponding to a single data point. Data is restricted to within a single measure category and can be optionally filtered by measure, reporting unit type and reporting dates. Matching within each filter is by logical disjunction (OR) and matching across filters is by logical conjunction (AND). NOTE: There is currently a pagination restriction on this query that restricts requests to a maximum of 1000 results. Use skip and top to control this pagination. Sorting is not currently available.

Actions.Name: Get Flat Formatted Data
Actions.Description: Gets formatted data in a flattened structure with each item corresponding to a single data point. Data is restricted to within a single measure category and can be optionally filtered by measure, reporting unit code, reporting unit type and reporting dates. Matching within each filter is by logical disjunction (OR) and matching across filters is by logical conjunction (AND). NOTE: There is currently a pagination restriction on this query that restricts requests to a maximum of 1000 results. Use skip and top to control this pagination. Sorting is not currently available.

Actions.Name: Get Single Measure
Actions.Description: Gets a single measure matching the supplied measure code.

Actions.Name: Get Measure Categories
Actions.Description: Gets a list of measure categories.

Actions.Name: Get Data Items for Measure
Actions.Description: Gets a list of all data items for the specified measure.

Actions.Name: Get Measure Download
Actions.Description: Gets a measure download, in XLSX format, for the supplied measure download code.

Actions.Name: Get Measure Downloads Available
Actions.Description: Gets dictionary, indexed by the measure download code, of all available measure download codes and descriptions that can be used in the measure download API call.

Actions.Name: Get Measure Across Reporting Unit Download
Actions.Description: Gets a measure across reporting unit download, in XLSX format, for the supplied measure download code.

Actions.Name: Get Measures
Actions.Description: Gets list of all measures, optionally filtered, using logical disjunction (OR), by a list of measure category codes.

Actions.Name: Get Reported Measure Categories
Actions.Description: Gets list of all reported measure categories available.

Actions.Name: Get Reported Measure Categories for Measure Category Code
Actions.Description: Gets a list reported measure categories matching the supplied reported measure category codes. NOTE: Reported measure codes are not constrained to be unique in the system.

Actions.Name: Get Reported Measures for Reported Measure Category
Actions.Description: Gets a list of all reported measures for a specified reported measure category code.

Actions.Name: Get Reported Measures
Actions.Description: Gets list of reported measures, optionally filtered by a list of measure codes.

Actions.Name: Get Reporting Unit Datasheet Codes Available
Actions.Description: Gets dictionary, indexed by the datasheet code, of all available reporting unit datasheet codes and descriptions that can be used in the reporting unit download API call.

Actions.Name: Get Reporting Unit Mapping Download
Actions.Description: Gets the reporting unit mapping download, in XLSX format.

Actions.Name: Get Reporting Units
Actions.Description: Gets list of all reporting units, optionally filtered, using logical disjunction (OR), by a list of reporting unit type codes.

Actions.Name: Get Reporting Units Available for Measure
Actions.Description: Gets a list of all reporting units that have data available for the specified measure.

Actions.Name: Get Reporting Unit Types
Actions.Description: Gets a list of reporting unit types.

Actions.Name: Get Simple Download
Actions.Description: Gets a simple download, in XLSX format, for the supplied download code.

Actions.Name: Get Simple Downloads Available
Actions.Description: Gets dictionary, indexed by the simple download code, of all available simple download codes and descriptions that can be used in the simple download API call.

Actions.Name: Get Single Measure Category
Actions.Description: Gets a single measure category matching the supplied measure category code.

Actions.Name: Get Measures for a Measure Category
Actions.Description: Gets a list of measures for the specified measure category code.

Actions.Name: Get Single Reported Measure
Actions.Description: Gets a single reported measure.

Actions.Name: Get Data Items for Reported Measure
Actions.Description: Gets a list of all data items for the specified reported measure.

Actions.Name: Get Single Reporting Unit
Actions.Description: Gets a single reporting unit matching the supplied reporting unit code.

Actions.Name: Get Brick Codes for Reporting Unit
Actions.Description: Gets list of all brick codes available for the specified reporting unit.

Actions.Name: Get Data Items for Reporting Unit
Actions.Description: Gets a list of all data items for the specified reporting unit.

Actions.Name: Get Measures with Data Available for Reporting Unit
Actions.Description: Get list of all measures that have data available for the specified reporting unit.

Actions.Name: Get Single Reporting Unit Type
Actions.Description: Gets a single reporting unit type matching the supplied reporting unit type code.

Actions.Name: Get Dictionary of Reporting Unit Codes and Available Bricks
Actions.Description: Gets a dictionary of reporting units codes and their available bricks, for the specified reporting unit type.

Actions.Name: Get Reporting Unit Data Download
Actions.Description: Gets a reporting unit data download, in XLSX format, for the supplied reporting unit code and datasheet code.
